info.title: Content Enrichment API
info.description: IMPORTANT - add and update calls mention that some parameters are supposed to be in the body instead of in the query - that is NOT the case. Swagger would not work otherwise, that's the only reason why it says "body".

200.description: the new item with new unique ID

ID.description: only in POST requests, never in API returns

Shape_ID.description: legacy name for KeyFrame_ID; only in POST requests, never in API returns

Appearance_ID.description: legacy name for Tag_ID; only in POST requests, never in API returns

Object_ID.description: only in POST requests, never in API returns
only in POST requests, never in API returns

PointLength.description: amount of points in each KeyFrame

Video_ID.description: only in POST requests, never in API returns

Description.description: text saying sth about the object

DirectOpen.description: link-type that shall be opened directly

Hits.description: counter for clicks made on this object

Video_ID.description: only in POST requests, never in API returns

link.description: referencing either a video UID or a playlist ID

auto.description: played automatically if user chooses nothing else (only one per group of children

dir.description: not yet implemented; show this entry in index

hidden.description: allows hiding this button from sight
